title: A Family this Christmas
description: Holiday Romance Collection book #3  A Family this Christmas Katie was around the Elory family nearly her entire life. She was even called 'sis' by one of Jackson's brothers, Tommy. It wasn't until her graduation party turned out to be a dud, did she learn of her attraction to one of the Elory boys. Join Katie, Garret, Jackson, Tommy, Ellen and Mary this Christmas for fun, laughter, and Love.  This book is a holiday romance. It also features a sneak peek of the fourth book of the Holiday Romance Collection.
author: Danielle Lee Zwissler
